content.title: Fobzu - Friends of Birzeit University
content.description: Fobzu is a UK charity championing the right to education for Palestinians under occupation and in exile. Through scholarships, fellowships, and advocacy.

DONATE

Hope for the Future

Education is a source of hope for young Palestinians in the face of great adversity. Help a Palestinian student build their future.
Donate

Occupation and Exile

Most Palestinians live, teach and study under occupation and in exile.

Fobzu works to overcome the barriers to education for Palestinians.

Find Out More

Raising Awareness

Bringing together Palestinian, UK, and international scholars and students to highlight challenges facing Palestinian education and how these can be overcome.
Find Out More

Building Links

Promoting academic connections between UK and Palestinian scholars
Find Out More

Emergency Actions

Responding to urgent educational needs in times of crisis. Learn about our work during the Covid-19 pandemic.
Find Out More

40+ Years of Fobzu

Fobzu has been supporting Palestinian education since 1978
Find Out More

Latest News and Events

Latest Updates | Subscribe to our Newsletter | Social Media

![Friends of Birzeit University - Fobzu](https://fobzu.org/wp-content/uploads/2019/12/Blue-Logo-Fobzu-no-40.png)
[DONATE](https://fobzu.org/donate/#donate)
## [Hope for the Future](https://fobzu.org/donate/)
Education is a source of hope for young Palestinians in the face of great adversity. Help a Palestinian student build their future.
[Donate](https://fobzu.org/donate/)
## [Occupation and Exile](https://fobzu.org/occupation-and-exile)
Most Palestinians live, teach and study under occupation and in exile.
Fobzu works to overcome the barriers to education for Palestinians.
[Find Out More](https://fobzu.org/occupation-and-exile)
## [Raising Awareness](https://fobzu.org/education-occupation-liberation/)
Bringing together Palestinian, UK, and international scholars and students to highlight challenges facing Palestinian education and how these can be overcome.
[Find Out More](https://fobzu.org/education-occupation-liberation/)
## [Building Links](https://fobzu.org/projects-fobzu-oxford-writing-residency/)
Promoting academic connections between UK and Palestinian scholars
[Find Out More](https://fobzu.org/projects-fobzu-oxford-writing-residency/)
## [Emergency Actions](https://fobzu.org/projects/elearning/)
Responding to urgent educational needs in times of crisis. Learn about our work during the Covid-19 pandemic.
[Find Out More](https://fobzu.org/projects/elearning/)
## [40+ Years of Fobzu](https://fobzu.org/40-years-of-fobzu/)
Fobzu has been supporting Palestinian education since 1978
[Find Out More](https://fobzu.org/40-years-of-fobzu/)
## Latest News and Events
[Latest Updates](https://fobzu.org/news_events/#latest_news) [| Subscribe to our Newsletter](https://fobzu.org/news_events/#newsletter) [| Social Media](https://fobzu.org/news_events/#social_media)

Hope for the Future

Education is a source of hope for young Palestinians in the face of great adversity. Help a Palestinian student build their future.
Donate

Occupation and Exile

Most Palestinians live, teach and study under occupation and in exile.

Fobzu works to overcome the barriers to education for Palestinians.

Find Out More

Raising Awareness

Bringing together Palestinian, UK, and international scholars and students to highlight challenges facing Palestinian education and how these can be overcome.

Building Links

## [Occupation and Exile](https://fobzu.org/occupation-and-exile)
Most Palestinians live, teach and study under occupation and in exile.
Fobzu works to overcome the barriers to education for Palestinians.
[Find Out More](https://fobzu.org/occupation-and-exile)
## [Raising Awareness](https://fobzu.org/education-occupation-liberation/)
Bringing together Palestinian, UK, and international scholars and students to highlight challenges facing Palestinian education and how these can be overcome.
[Find Out More](https://fobzu.org/education-occupation-liberation/)
## [Building Links](https://fobzu.org/projects-fobzu-oxford-writing-residency/)
Promoting academic connections between UK and Palestinian scholars
[Find Out More](https://fobzu.org/projects-fobzu-oxford-writing-residency/)
## [Emergency Actions](https://fobzu.org/projects/elearning/)
Responding to urgent educational needs in times of crisis. Learn about our work during the Covid-19 pandemic.
[Find Out More](https://fobzu.org/projects/elearning/)

Fobzu has been supporting Palestinian education since 1978

![Friends of Birzeit University - Fobzu](https://fobzu.org/wp-content/uploads/2019/12/Blue-Logo-Fobzu-no-40.png)
[DONATE](https://fobzu.org/donate/#donate)
## [Hope for the Future](https://fobzu.org/donate/)
Education is a source of hope for young Palestinians in the face of great adversity. Help a Palestinian student build their future.
[Donate](https://fobzu.org/donate/)
## [Occupation and Exile](https://fobzu.org/occupation-and-exile)
Most Palestinians live, teach and study under occupation and in exile.
Fobzu works to overcome the barriers to education for Palestinians.
[Find Out More](https://fobzu.org/occupation-and-exile)
## [Raising Awareness](https://fobzu.org/education-occupation-liberation/)
Bringing together Palestinian, UK, and international scholars and students to highlight challenges facing Palestinian education and how these can be overcome.
[Find Out More](https://fobzu.org/education-occupation-liberation/)
## [Building Links](https://fobzu.org/projects-fobzu-oxford-writing-residency/)
Promoting academic connections between UK and Palestinian scholars
[Find Out More](https://fobzu.org/projects-fobzu-oxford-writing-residency/)
## [Emergency Actions](https://fobzu.org/projects/elearning/)
Responding to urgent educational needs in times of crisis. Learn about our work during the Covid-19 pandemic.
[Find Out More](https://fobzu.org/projects/elearning/)
## [40+ Years of Fobzu](https://fobzu.org/40-years-of-fobzu/)
Fobzu has been supporting Palestinian education since 1978
[Find Out More](https://fobzu.org/40-years-of-fobzu/)

metadata.title: Fobzu - Friends of Birzeit University
metadata.description: Fobzu is a UK charity championing the right to education for Palestinians under occupation and in exile. Through scholarships, fellowships, and advocacy.
